name: pumpkin pie cocoon shrug
notes:
this crochet shrug is super pretty and cosy. the cocoon cardigan has an easy lacy pretty pattern and is for beginners. it is made from a rectangle with no increases or decreases or shaping. it is a 4 row repeat pattern and works up fast. 

skill: easy, beginner friendly
sizes: xs (s, m, l, xl) (2xl, 3xl, 4xl, 5xl)

material
yarn: any medium weight (weight 4) yarn can be used. 
suggested yarn: lion brand- pound of love, it is a 100% premium acrylic yarn.
shade: pumpkin pie (color 135n, article 550).
amount needed- 375 (395, 445, 466, 487) (553, 577, 644, 663) g or 843 (888, 1000, 1047, 1095) (1243, 1297, 1447, 1490) yards.
yardage: 932 m/ 1020 yards in 1 skein. each skein has 454 g/ 16 oz of yarn. 
note: for a change in border/ length more yarn than stated may be needed.
crochet hook: 6 mm or j size hook.
notions: stitch markers, tapestry needle, measuring tape, scissors.

the pattern is written in us crochet terms in english. this is a 9 page pdf pattern. a print friendly version is available. it has written instructions for the crochet pattern and detailed pattern row by row notes with pictures. it does not include finished product. it can be made in any similar yarn suitable for your hook. there is a youtube tutorial that explains in detail and i have linked it.

immediately after purchase you will receive a pdf crochet pattern which is a digital download.
due to the nature of patterns, this crochet pattern may not be exchanged or returned for a refund. all sales are final.
please feel free to reach out anytime i am happy to help!
